title: Assurance
verses: John 10:28–29 (WEB) — “I give them eternal life… no one is able to snatch them out of my Father’s hand.”
1 John 5:11–12 (WEB) — “God gave to us eternal life, and this life is in his Son… He who has the Son has the life.”
Romans 8:38–39 (WEB) — “Neither death, nor life… nor any other created thing, will be able to separate us from God’s love.”
Philippians 1:6 (WEB) — “He who began a good work in you will complete it until the day of Jesus Christ.”
body: Assurance rests on God’s promise and Christ’s finished work—not your feelings. Return to the gospel: Jesus saves, keeps, and will raise you up. When doubts whisper, rehearse His Word and remember His faithfulness in your story.
prayer: Father, thank You for saving me in Christ. Anchor my heart in Your promises. When doubts rise, speak peace and steady my steps in Your love. Amen.
